articles.description: Jake Paul leaves a permanent stain on two-time heavyweight champion Mike Tyson's boxing legacy with a tedious points win in Texas.
articles.title: Mike Tyson vs Jake Paul: Mike Tyson beaten by Jake Paul on points in drab contest

articles.description: Seeking a response to defeat by the All Blacks seven days prior, Ireland's victory over Argentina answers some questions while presenting a few more.
articles.title: Ireland 22-19 Argentina: Better Ireland still seeking answers after nail-biting Pumas win

articles.description: Ireland's Katie Taylor defeats Amanda Serrano narrowly on points to retain her light-welterweight title in Texas.
articles.title: Tyson vs Paul: Katie Taylor narrowly defeats Amanda Serrano on points in epic rematch

articles.description: Ben Doak ensured Josko Gvardiol endured a taxing time as he shone in Scotland's Nations League win over Croatia, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Scotland 1-0 Croatia: How Ben Doak left Modric & Gvardiol in shade

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Portugal vs Poland in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: Portugal vs Poland: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: The gap between England and South Africa is usually narrower than expectations, but Steve Borthwick's side must raise their game again.
articles.title: England vs South Africa: Steve Borthwick's team need to raise game once more

articles.description: LeBron James records a fourth straight triple-double for the first time in his career as the LA Lakers beat the San Antonio Spurs.
articles.title: LeBron James makes history as LA Lakers down San Antonio Spurs in NBA Cup

articles.description: The divisive bout between veteran Mike Tyson and YouTuber-turned-boxer Jake Paul in Texas did little to win over the boxing fraternity.
articles.title: Mike Tyson vs Jake Paul: 'Looked like trash' - boxing world critical of Tyson-Paul fight

articles.description: Mexico head coach Javier Aguirre was left with blood spilling from his head after being hit by a beer can after his side's defeat by Honduras.
articles.title: Mexico coach Javier Aguirre left bloodied after being hit with beer can after Honduras defeat

articles.description: Northern Ireland manager Michael O'Neill discusses the progress of his side in the last 12 months after their 2-0 win over Belarus in Belfast on Friday.
articles.title: Northern Ireland 2-0 Belarus: Transition continues to gather pace ahead of big 2025
